title: 'CitrixBleed 2' Shows Signs of Active Exploitation
summary: 'CitrixBleed 2' Shows Signs of Active Exploitation. If exploited, the critical vulnerability allows attackers to maintain access for longer periods of time than the original CitrixBleed flaw, all while remaining undetected....
content: If exploited, the critical vulnerability allows attackers to maintain access for longer periods of time than the original CitrixBleed flaw, all while remaining undetected.
